entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Upgrading .NET 6 to .NET 7: "import.meta may only appear in a module" JS error #46073
  • Decide if duplicate EventNames in LoggerMessage is appropriate #46072
  • Add Route Short Circuit middleware #46071
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [API Proposal] Allow Dispatching to Blazor Renderer Sync Context #46068
  • Better way to override default RoleValidator #46066
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json_netty #46063
  • TEST: Automated move to AzDO #46061
  • Blazor AccountClaimsPrincipalFactory CreateUserAsync fires multiple times when refreshing the browser #46060
  • RequireLocalPort extension for IEndpointConventionBuilder #46057
  • Browser is flooded with Correlation and Nonce cookies after logging into Azure. #46053
  • HttpContext property of HttpContextAccessor is null in the ClientCertificateValidation callback of HttpsConnectionAdapterOptions #46052
  • [Blazor] Allow component resx files to be named razor.resx to allow nesting #46051
  • In .NET 7 large number of concurrent requests will memory leak #46050
  • Put the query parameters into RouteData.RouteValues #46047
  • [Perf] Remove extra array allocation when using request filters with request delegate #46046
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Generating code for an OpenAPI Service Reference fails if the path to the swagger file has spaces in it. #45926
    Discussions
  • SignalR with MessagePack: different MessagePackSerializerOptions per hub #45660
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter does not serialize HttpValidationProblemDetails.Errors #45680
    8.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, stage1vanilla #46019
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, stage1publishaot #46035
  • Incorrect target framework for Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.EntityFrameworkCore #46030
  • Blazor Webassembly always getting ERR_CONNECTION_RESET #44763
  • Asp.Versioning Libraries do not add Minimal API version to IApiVersionDescriptionProvider #45972
  • Unexpected parent component rerendering #46044
  • Route Matching mismatching #45922

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46070
    area-runtime
  • Mark API from 7 as shipped #46069
  • Wrong replication of resource names in embedded provider #46067
    community-contribution
  • Enable setting ServerTimeout and KeepAliveInterval in HubConnectionBuilder #46065
    area-signalr
  • Add new "api" project template that supports native AOT #46064
    area-mvc
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Fix DefaultProblemDetailsWriter polymorphism #45906
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update bind:set,after runtime apis (#44412) #46059
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] Use non-localized 2.1.x links in installer #45409
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 2.1.39
  • [release/2.1] Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `4bd499b` to `74055e1` #46062
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • [release/7.0] Remove legacy check to fix Runtime SiteExtension #46045
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Remove legacy check to fix Runtime SiteExtension #46058
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.14
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection (#45878) #46048
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] [SignalR] Avoid Http2 when negotiate auth is used #46013
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.3
  • Annotate QueryString.HasValue for nullability #46056
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #46009
    3.1.x
  • Increase experimental version #46043
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45878
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers
  • [AOT] Add expression free request filter pipeline for RequestDelegate #46020
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
  • [release/7.0] Mark API as shipped #46042
    tell-mode
  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • Making `JsonOptions` AOT/Trimmer-safe with EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SauceLabs Connection version #45242
    area-signalr
  • [AOT] Remove AOT warning suppressions #46015
    area-runtime
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
